item.title: Ram Kapoor Surprises Fans With A Drastic Weight Loss Transformation | Check Pics Inside - News18
item.description:
Ram Kapoor Surprises Fans With A Drastic Weight Loss Transformation

Date: December 20, 2024

Source: News18

Actor Ram Kapoor wowed his fans with a selfie showcasing his impressive weight loss transformation. After a hiatus from social media, he reemerged looking fit and healthy.

  • Best known for his role in 'Bade Achhe Lagte Hai', Ram Kapoor shared his transformation on Instagram.
  • In a recent outing, he was seen with his wife, Gautami Kapoor, flaunting his new look.
  • Ram hinted that he has lost 42 kgs, although he did not specify the methods used to achieve this.
  • His transformation has drawn admiration and compliments from fans and celebrities alike.
“Hi guys, sorry for the slightly long absence from Insta, was working on myself quite extensively.”

Ram Kapoor's drastic weight loss transformation has both surprised and inspired many of his fans, leading to widespread praise across social media.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 16: Allu Arjun film glides past ₹1000 crore mark as it enters 3rd week - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 16

Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sukumar's Pushpa 2: The Rule continues to perform exceptionally well at the box office, crossing the ₹1000 crore mark in just 16 days.

  • The film collected approximately ₹12.11 crore on day 16, totaling around ₹1002.71 crore net in India.
  • In its first week, the film made ₹725.8 crore net, followed by ₹264.8 crore in the second week.
  • Despite a 63.52% decrease in collections from week one to week two, the film's performance remains impressive.
  • It grossed ₹632.50 crore net from Hindi markets alone in its first 15 days.
  • World-wide, the film surpassed ₹1500 crore within 14 days.
“Enjoy the Biggest Film #Pushpa2 only on the Big Screens in this Biggest Holiday Season.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2: The Rule is not only a commercial success but also a significant cultural phenomenon, resonating widely with audiences across various demographics.

item.title: Brad Pitt faces allegations of hiding 'embezzled property' amid War of Rose with Angelina Jolie - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Brad Pitt Faces Allegations of Hiding Embezzled Property in Legal Battle with Angelina Jolie

Publication Date & Source: December 2024, Hindustan Times

Brad Pitt has been accused of hiding “embezzled assets” amid a legal dispute with Angelina Jolie over Chateau Miraval, the French winery they purchased together. The ongoing court battle highlights serious allegations of financial misconduct related to the ownership and management of the winery.

  • Pitt is accused of concealing funds and diverting them for personal use instead of business purposes.
  • The legal dispute began in 2022, following Jolie's intent to exit their business partnership.
  • Jolie countersued for $250 million, claiming Pitt froze her out of operations.
  • Tenute del Mondo has alleged Pitt's team misappropriated funds intended for the winery.
  • Legal negotiations have involved claims and counterclaims between both parties regarding asset ownership.
“[Brad] caused Chateau Miraval’s funds and assets to be spent on his personal expenses and to be diverted to his other business ventures rather than be paid out as dividends.”

The allegations have escalated the ongoing conflict, with both parties seeking to protect their financial interests in the winery. The outcome of this dispute may have lasting implications on their business dealings and personal lives.

item.title: Joyful Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan attend Aaradhya Bachchan’s annual day with Vrinda Rai - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan Attend Aaradhya's School Event

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

On Friday evening, Bollywood couple Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan attended their daughter Aaradhya's school event alongside Aishwarya's mother, Vrinda Rai. This appearance comes after recent rumors of estrangement between the couple.

  • Abhishek and Aishwarya were seen entering Dhirubhai Ambani International School in Mumbai.
  • The couple appeared proud, recording Aaradhya's performance on their phones during the event.
  • The annual day celebration attracted Bollywood's elite, including Shah Rukh Khan, Kareena Kapoor, and Saif Ali Khan.
Amitabh Bachchan expressed his pride, stating, “Children .. their innocence and desire to be at their best in the presence of parents .. such a delight.”

The Bachchan family showcases their strong bond and support for Aaradhya through these public appearances.

item.title: Joyful Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan attend Aaradhya Bachchan’s annual day with Vrinda Rai on day 2 at Ambani school - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan Attend Aaradhya’s Annual Day

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

On the second day of Aaradhya Bachchan's annual day celebrations at the Ambani school, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan attended with their daughter Aaradhya, joined by grandmother Vrinda Rai.

  • Aishwarya and Abhishek were spotted enjoying the event.
  • Aaradhya's school is known for hosting impressive annual showcases.
  • Family moments were highlighted during the event.
“It’s a joy to be part of Aaradhya’s milestone,” expressed Abhishek Bachchan.

This event reflects the close-knit family values cherished by the Bachchans, celebrating their daughter’s important moments.

item.title: Nita Ambani to Kareena Kapoor Khan: Best dressed at annual day of Dhirubhai Ambani School - The Times of India
item.description:
Best Dressed Celebrities at Dhirubhai Ambani School Annual Day

Date: Dec 20, 2024 | Source: TimesOfIndia.com

The Dhirubhai Ambani International School hosted its annual meet in Mumbai, featuring many Bollywood stars and business icons flaunting their fashion choices.

  • Nita Ambani wore a stunning cream and white sari.
  • Isha Ambani showcased a casual emerald kurta set with Valentino heels.
  • Kareena Kapoor Khan arrived in a cutout-printed black and red wrap dress.
  • Suhana Khan opted for a black sleeveless dress with block heels.
  • Gauri Khan went for an ivory embroidered kurta set.
  • Aishwarya Rai chose a black flowy Anarkali set by Manish Malhotra.
  • Genelia Deshmukh wore a denim-on-denim co-ord set.
  • Mira Rajput Kapoor also sported a denim-on-denim look.
"Let’s see who wore what at this stylish annual meet." - Piyali Bhadra

The event highlighted the intersection of fashion and prominence, showcasing the striking styles of various celebrities.

item.title: Ambani School Annual Day: Nita Ambani, Kareena Kapoor, And Aishwarya Rai Make Dazzling Statements - News18
item.description:
Ambani School Annual Day: Nita Ambani, Kareena Kapoor, And Aishwarya Rai Make Dazzling Statements

Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: News18

Last night, the Dhirubhai Ambani International School in Mumbai hosted its annual day, showcasing a star-studded attendance by celebrities to support their children.

  • The event featured attendees like Aishwarya Rai, Kareena Kapoor, and Abhishek Bachchan.
  • Nita Ambani made a stunning appearance in a cream saree with gold embellishments.
  • Kareena Kapoor opted for a stylish printed wrap dress.
  • Aishwarya Rai showcased a classic black anarkali kurta.
  • Gauri Khan attended in an ivory embroidered kurta set alongside her daughter Suhana in a chic black dress.
"It was a star-studded night..."

The annual day highlighted not just the students but also the glamorous styles of their celebrity parents, making it a memorable occasion.

item.title: ‘Viduthalai Part 2’ movie review: Vijay Sethupathi powers Vetri Maaran’s sequel where ideology outweighs intimate storytelling - The Hindu
item.description:
‘Viduthalai Part 2’ movie review: Vijay Sethupathi powers Vetri Maaran’s sequel where ideology outweighs intimate storytelling

Published: December 20, 2024 07:44 pm IST
Source: The Hindu

The film explores the character of Perumal Vaathiyaar, played by Vijay Sethupathi, as he transforms from an unassuming teacher to a leader of a separatist group in a politically charged narrative.

  • The sequel focuses on the systemic oppression faced by characters and the political environment.
  • Vetri Maaran’s direction is praised for its technical aspects, especially during action sequences.
  • The film runs for 170 minutes and features a strong performance from Vijay Sethupathi.
  • The narrative suffers from preachiness and lacks the emotional depth of its predecessor.
“Despite a strong political core that puts out a message that’s unfortunately relevant even in today’s world, the sequel lacks the emotions that worked wonders with the first part.”

Overall, while the film tackles significant themes and performances, it struggles with pacing and depth compared to the original.

item.title: Honey Singh recalls ‘wishing for death' as he talks about fighting mental illness in his documentary: ‘I saw hell’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Honey Singh talks about fighting bipolar disorder, ‘wishing for his death everyday’ in his documentary Yo Yo Honey Singh Famous.

Date: Dec 20, 2024 08:10 PM IST | Source: Hindustan Times

Honey Singh's documentary, 'Yo Yo Honey Singh: Famous,' released on Netflix, addresses his ongoing struggles with mental health, including a discussion about his experiences with bipolar disorder.

  • The documentary reveals Honey's journey through mental illness, where he described feeling like he was living in hell.
  • He recounted moments during a tour that triggered his symptoms of paranoia and depression.
  • Honey Singh explained the psychological impact of his illness, describing hallucinations and severe anxiety.
  • He emphasized the depth of his struggles, highlighting how he wished for death every day.
  • The film provides an intimate look at his personal and professional life, showing the support from family, friends, and collaborators.
“I saw hell. I wished for death every day.” - Honey Singh

The documentary serves as a deeply personal portrayal of a talented artist’s battle with mental health and his journey towards recovery.

item.title: Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2 The Rule surpasses Stree 2, Jawan, Baahubali 2 to become biggest Hindi net grosser in just 15 days - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2 The Rule surpasses Stree 2, Jawan, Baahubali 2 to become biggest Hindi net grosser in just 15 days

Date: Dec 20, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna's Pushpa 2 The Rule has achieved a remarkable milestone by becoming the biggest Hindi net grosser of all time, grossing ₹621 crore in just 15 days.

  • The film surpasses Baahubali 2, KGF Chapter 2, Stree 2, Jawan, Pathaan, and Animal in terms of Hindi box office gross.
  • In its second week, the total collection stands at ₹264.8 crore, with major contributions from the Hindi language.
  • Pushpa 2 is directed by Sukumar and is a sequel to the hit Pushpa The Rise.
“The film is now eyeing to surpass Baahubali 2 The Conclusion's worldwide collection to secure its place among India's highest-grossing films.”

Pushpa 2 continues to captivate audiences and set new records at the box office.

item.title: Abhishek Bachchan-Aishwarya Rai come together for Aaradhya's annual day, Virat Kohli scolds paparazzi for - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai at Aaradhya's event; Virat Kohli confronts paparazzi

Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

Bollywood stars Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai attended their daughter Aaradhya's annual day event, showcasing a united family front. Meanwhile, cricketer Virat Kohli took a stand against paparazzi for invading the privacy of kids Akaay and Vamika.

  • Abhishek and Aishwarya were spotted together at their daughter's annual day.
  • Virat Kohli expressed his discontent with paparazzi filming children.
  • The event highlighted parental concerns regarding children's privacy in the public eye.
“We need to respect kids' privacy; they deserve a normal upbringing.” - Virat Kohli

This occasion brings attention to the ongoing debate around celebrity children's privacy and public scrutiny.

item.title: Soha Ali Khan shares glimpse of Inaaya's bond with Taimur, their ‘cute’ journey as cousins on his birthday. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Soha Ali Khan's cute video featuring Taimur Ali Khan and daughter Inaaya melts the hearts of the social media users.

Date: Dec 20, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Soha Ali Khan shared a heartwarming birthday tribute to her nephew Taimur Ali Khan, showcasing the special bond between Taimur and her daughter Inaaya through an adorable video.

  • Taimur Ali Khan celebrates his eighth birthday.
  • The video shows Taimur and Inaaya having fun, jumping on a bed, swimming, and enjoying pizza.
  • Soha wrote a sweet birthday message, highlighting their journey as cousins.
  • Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan organized a sporty birthday bash for Taimur.
“From jumping on the bed to racing freestyle we have come a long way - here's to a lifetime of family, food and prezzies !! Happy Birthday Tim bhai.”

The video has received numerous positive reactions on social media, with fans expressing delight over the adorable moments captured.

item.title: Nepali social media influencer Bibek Pangeni dies at 32 - The Times of India
item.description:
Nepali Social Media Influencer Bibek Pangeni Dies at 32

Publication Date: Recent News Source

Bibek Pangeni, a popular Nepali social media influencer, has passed away at the young age of 32, leaving behind a significant impact on his community.

  • Pangeni was known for his vibrant and engaging content on platforms like Instagram and YouTube.
  • His sudden death has shocked his followers and the wider social media community in Nepal.
  • Fans and fellow influencers have expressed their condolences and shared memories of his inspirational content.
“Bibek was not just an influencer, he was a beacon of positivity and creativity,” said a fellow influencer.

This tragic news underlines the importance of mental health awareness among influencers and the pressures they face.

item.title: Shah Rukh & Suhana sing along to Levitating X Woh Ladki Jo at AbRam’s annual day; actor gets emotional on Swades act - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Shah Rukh Khan and Suhana Khan’s videos enjoying the former’s songs at AbRam Khan’s annual function are the cutest thing you’ll see today

Date: Dec 20, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Shah Rukh Khan and his daughter Suhana Khan were seen singing along to a popular mashup of his iconic songs during AbRam Khan's annual school function. Their performance has gone viral, capturing the hearts of many fans.

  • The mashup of Levitating and Woh Ladki Jo was approved by Dua Lipa during her Indian tour.
  • Shah Rukh Khan joined in singing at the Dhirubhai Ambani School's annual function.
  • Another emotional moment featured Shah Rukh singing the title track of Swades as students paid tribute to the country.
  • Suhana Khan will star alongside Shah Rukh in the upcoming film King.
“Watching Shah Rukh be himself is always an honour!”

This emotional display of family and patriotism at a school function resonated deeply with fans, showcasing the strong bond between Shah Rukh and Suhana.

item.title: Arjun Kapoor opens up about ‘impulsive’ decision to be there for ex-partner Malaika Arora after her father’s death: ‘I have a fear of loss’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Arjun Kapoor Reflects on Supporting Malaika Arora After Her Father's Death

Publication Date: October 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

Actor Arjun Kapoor opened up about the decision to be there for his ex-partner Malaika Arora following the death of her adopted father. He shared insights into his past relationships and how personal traumas influence his approach to love.

  • Kapoor discussed his emotional bond with Arora and the impulse to support her in difficult times.
  • He reflected on the impact of his mother’s death and his parents’ separation on his romantic relationships.
  • In a podcast interview, Kapoor emphasized the importance of being present for loved ones regardless of circumstances.
  • He also commented on the challenges of public relationships in today’s media landscape.
  • Kapoor expressed that his fear of loss stems from his childhood experiences, affecting his commitment to relationships.
“There’s a difference. My mom left me, my father made a choice. So, there’s a fear of loss. There’s a feeling that eventually, everyone will leave.” - Arjun Kapoor

In conclusion, Arjun Kapoor's reflections highlight the complexities of relationships, particularly how past experiences shape one’s approach to love and support in times of need.

item.title: 'Singham Again' OTT release: Here's when and where to watch the Ajay Devgn, Akshay Kumar, Ranveer Singh, - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Singham Again OTT Release: Watch Details for Ajay Devgn, Akshay Kumar & More

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

An upcoming action film 'Singham Again' featuring a star-studded cast is set to have its OTT release. Fans are eagerly anticipating when and where they can watch this movie.

  • The film stars Ajay Devgn, Akshay Kumar, Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Kareena Kapoor Khan, and Arjun Kapoor.
  • It will be available on popular streaming platforms.
  • The exact release date and viewing options are yet to be confirmed.
“Stay tuned for updates on the exciting release of 'Singham Again'!”

This release is highly anticipated due to the involvement of prominent Bollywood actors, which adds to the film's excitement.

item.title: Angelina Jolie ‘so consumed by hatred for Brad Pitt’ that her kids are suffering now - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Angelina Jolie ‘so consumed by hatred for Brad Pitt’ that her kids are suffering now

Date: Dec 20, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Angelina Jolie is reportedly struggling with intense emotions stemming from her ongoing legal battles with ex-husband Brad Pitt, leading to negative impacts on her children.

  • Jolie's mood has become volatile, reportedly 'lashing out' at her staff and children.
  • She scored a legal win over the sale of her stake in the Château Miraval winery, previously co-owned with Pitt.
  • A court ruling requires Pitt to provide documents related to alleged domestic abuse accusations.
  • Insiders suggest that while Jolie loves her children, she maintains a strict and demanding parenting style.
  • Jolie's children often feel relieved when she is in a better mood.
“She expects her six children to help with chores, stay physically active, and remain diligent in their responsibilities.”

This situation reflects the complexities of Jolie's balancing act between her personal struggles and her role as a mother.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi vs Stree 2 Box Office (2-Week Comparison): Leads With 178 Crores+ Earnings, Has Dethroned Shraddha Kapoor’s Biggie Every Single Day! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi vs Stree 2 Box Office (2-Week Comparison)

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2 continues to set records in the Hindi film industry, surpassing major films while competing against Stree 2 for the top position. In just two weeks, it has made significant strides at the box office.

Key Points

  • Pushpa 2 has grossed a total of 632.50 crores in its two-week run.
  • It surpassed the opening-day collections of Jawan, scoring 72 crores on its first day.
  • Stree 2 currently has lifetime earnings of 627.50 crores.
  • Pushpa 2 has outperformed Stree 2 on all release days.
  • Predictions indicate that Pushpa 2 may cross 700 crores in lifetime earnings.
“Clearly, the signs were visible from the first week. Pushpa 2 has already dethroned Stree 2 to become the highest-grossing Hindi film of all time.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's impressive box office run highlights its dominance over recent competitors, suggesting a strong likelihood of continued success in the coming weeks.

item.title: Mufasa The Lion King: Fans go berserk in theaters as Mahesh Babu's voice takes over the big screen; WATCH - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Mufasa The Lion King: Fans Go Wild Over Mahesh Babu's Voice in Theaters

Published on Dec 20, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Fans cannot contain their excitement as they flock to cinemas for the Telugu version of Mufasa: The Lion King, featuring the iconic voice of Mahesh Babu.

  • The movie was released on December 20, 2024, and has already created a buzz among moviegoers.
  • Numerous videos are circulating on social media showing fans cheering and celebrating during Mahesh Babu's intro.
  • Fans have expressed their admiration with posts saying, "His Voice is Enough To Conquer" and "Jai Babu."
  • Mahesh Babu described his experience of voicing Mufasa as incredible and heartfelt.
  • The film features other notable actors like Ali and Brahmanandam, who voice Timon and Pumbaa respectively.
  • Mufasa: The Lion King is directed by acclaimed filmmaker Barry Jenkins and is a musical drama following Mufasa's journey.
“Voicing Mufasa has been an incredible experience that I’ll always hold close to my heart.” - Mahesh Babu

The celebration of Mahesh Babu's voice in theaters marks a unique moment in Indian cinema, highlighting the deep connection his fans feel towards him.

item.title: Aishwarya Rai-Abhishek Bachchan squash divorce rumours; proudly record Aaradhya’s annual day performance with AbRam - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai-Abhishek Bachchan squash divorce rumours; proudly record Aaradhya’s annual day performance with AbRam

Date: Dec 20, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan recently dispelled divorce rumors by attending their daughter Aaradhya's annual day event together, delighting their fans.

  • The couple has been the subject of divorce speculation following a July social media post.
  • They were seen smiling together at the Dhirubhai Ambani School event, supporting their daughter.
  • Abhishek gained praise for helping Aishwarya with her outfit.
  • Videos of their attendance went viral, leading fans to defend them against trolls.
“Whatever it is, Aishwarya is a very good woman and respects her husband's family and traditions!”

This public display of unity has resonated well with fans, many of whom are relieved to see the couple together again.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh shares pics with ‘dream icon’ Vijay from her Goa wedding with Antony Thattil - The Hindu
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh Shares Pictures with ‘Dream Icon’ Vijay from Her Goa Wedding

Date: December 20, 2024
Source: The Hindu

Actor Keerthy Suresh recently shared pictures from her wedding with long-time boyfriend Antony Thattil, featuring Tamil superstar Vijay, whom she referred to as her ‘dream icon’.

  • Keerthy Suresh married Antony Thattil in a traditional south Indian style wedding on December 12.
  • She reappeared at a press conference for her upcoming film 'Baby John', a remake of Vijay's hit film 'Theri'.
  • Keerthy's wedding featured numerous stars from across the country.
“Interestingly, on Thursday, Keerthy made her first appearance post the wedding, at a press conference for her upcoming film, Baby John.”

The wedding was widely covered and celebrated, marking a significant moment in Keerthy's personal life amidst her professional endeavors.

item.title: UI Box Office Day 1 Prediction: Upendra Starrer Set For A Decent Start, To Stay Below 10 Crores - Koimoi
item.description:
UI Box Office Day 1 Prediction: Upendra Starrer Set For A Decent Start, To Stay Below 10 Crores

Date: December 20, 2024
Source: Koimoi

The Upendra starrer Kannada dystopian science fiction action film, UI has been released in the theatres today (December 20). The film is expected to open between 6 to 8 crores despite mixed reviews.

Key Points:

  • Advance booking for Day 1 comes to 2.60 crores.
  • Expected to open lower than Upendra’s previous film, Kabzaa.
  • UI will be released in 1400 screens across the country, including 850 in Karnataka.
  • Facing tough competition from Pushpa 2 and Viduthalai 2.
“The movie is expected to mainly do well in the state of Karnataka.”

UI is set in a dystopian 2040 era, dealing with themes of corruption and poverty. The opening day performance will be closely monitored.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 15: 1 Historical Record In Only 62 Days – Allu Arjun’s Blockbuster Beats Stree 2 To Become #1 Hindi Film Of All Time! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 15: 1 Historical Record In Only 62 Days – Allu Arjun’s Blockbuster B

Publication Date: December 19, 2024

Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil starrer has finally broken the most significant record in Hindi cinema. It has surpassed Stree 2 to become the highest-grossing film ever. If that’s not enough, the action thriller has also registered the biggest day 15 collection of all time.

Key Points:

  • Pushpa 2 is now the highest-grossing Hindi film with a total collection of 632.50 crores.
  • The film earned 14 crores on day 15, the highest day 15 collection ever.
  • It surpassed Stree 2’s previous record of 627.50 crores.
  • Pushpa 2’s collections indicate a strong performance with a dip of only 17% from the previous day.
  • The movie could reach the 700 crore mark, a first in Hindi cinema history.

Notable Statistics:

“The cost spent on the Hindi release is approximately 200 crores. Pushpa 2 has registered returns of 432.50 crores in only 15 days, with a ROI% of 216.25%.

In conclusion, Pushpa 2 is setting new benchmarks in the film industry with its outstanding box office performance, and it marks a historic moment for Hindi cinema.

item.title: Arjun Kapoor opens up about parents’ ‘traumatic’ separation, dad Boney Kapoor falling in love with Sridevi: ‘As long as he was happy with what he had done…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Arjun Kapoor opens up about parents’ ‘traumatic’ separation, dad Boney Kapoor falling in love with Sridevi: ‘As long as he was happy with what he had done…’

Date & Source: The Indian Express, Publication Date: December 2024

In a recent podcast, actor Arjun Kapoor shared the challenges he faced due to his parents’ separation and the loss of his mother, revealing how these traumatic events shaped his life and relationships.

  • Arjun’s parents, Boney Kapoor and Mona Shourie, separated when he was 10 years old.
  • Arjun lost his mother at the age of 25, just before his film debut.
  • Reflecting on his childhood, Arjun noted the lack of a typical father-son relationship due to his father's busy schedule.
  • He mentioned that the separation led him to mature early to maintain a connection with his father.
  • Arjun acknowledged that the emotional turmoil impacted his academic performance.
  • Despite challenges, he credited films for creating a bond with his father during tough times.
“As long as he was happy with what he had done, I was okay with it. Even if I wasn’t ok with it, I rationalised it in my head at a young age.”

The experience of his parents’ separation has had lasting effects on Arjun’s relationships and personal growth, emphasizing the importance of familial connections.

item.title: Pushpa 2 vs Baby John Screen Battle Intensifies: What are Anil Thadani and PVRInox fighting for this Christmas? - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Pushpa 2 vs Baby John Screen Battle Intensifies: What are Anil Thadani and PVRInox fighting for this Christmas?

Published on Dec 20, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The screen battle between Anil Thadani's Pushpa 2 and PVRInox's Baby John heats up as both parties vie for showtime during the Christmas holidays. Pushpa 2 seeks a dominant share of the shows, leading to tensions with multiplexes.

  • Pushpa 2 is aiming for 50% of showtimes on Christmas Day, while Baby John aims to secure at least 11,000 shows across India.
  • The competition has ignited disputes over how many shows each film will receive in multiplexes and single screens.
  • Pushpa 2 has been breaking box office records, approaching the Rs 600 crore mark after three weekends.
  • Multiplex operators are attempting to find a balance for both films while meeting industry demands.
“It’s unfair to have 50 percent shows in week 4, leaving nothing for new releases.”

The outcome of this battle will heavily influence the box office performance as the films navigate the competitive landscape during the holiday season.

item.title: Pushpa 2, Stree 2 or Kalki 2898 AD? BookMyShow report reveals which movie sold most tickets in 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Tops 2024 Ticket Sales According to BookMyShow Report

Date: Dec 20, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

BookMyShow's year-end report reveals that Pushpa 2 is the most-watched movie of 2024, with significant box office success and audience engagement.

  • Pushpa 2: The Rule sold 10.8 lakh solo tickets, becoming the most-watched film of the year.
  • The film is a sequel to the 2021 hit Pushpa: The Rise, featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna.
  • November 1 was a blockbuster day, recording 2.3 million tickets sold in 24 hours.
  • Live entertainment consumption grew by 18% in 2024 with over 30,000 events across 319 cities.
  • Music tourism showed a rise with 477,393 fans traveling for events, indicating a growing trend in live participation.
"Pushpa 2 has dominated the buzz and attention this year, solidifying its position in Telugu cinema history."

The report indicates a strong year for Telugu cinema with a growing interest in live events and music, suggesting Post-pandemic recovery and increasing audience engagement.

item.title: Viduthalai Part - 2 Box Office Collection Day 1 - Sacnilk
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.
